title: [MAC] How Do I Open ROFL Replay Files? [URGENT]
body:
[MAC] How Do I Open ROFL Replay Files? [URGENT]  - I need some help. I have tried right clicking on the ROFL replay file and open with League Of Legends and it did not open nor did anything....Please help. 

This replay is not old as I have just downloaded the replay yesterday. But since I play too many games today, it wasn't in my match history but it is in my documents folder.

Reason why I say "URGENT" is because I have heard that each new patch makes the replay unplayable.

replies.body: Hey, you'll want to use that file to create highlights.  The highlights are into web videos that can be viewed on your web browser.  Our[ replay guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)has more info, but I hope that helps!
